name: Queen ALFI-✘
description: 🔱 Queen Alfi-✘ is a super bot nade for Whatsapp 🔱

QEEN ALFI_SESSION.description: ✤ ඔබ QR කේතය SACN කිරීමෙන් පසු ලැබෙන කේතය මෙතනට එක් කරන්න ✤

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Message that a member has been added to the group. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: AFK message when you in AFK mode.

ALIVE_LOGO.description: Picture with alive message. Paste an image direct link or do '.setalive' command after deploying the bot.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: The message that appears when typing the '.alive' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

ALFI_CHAT.description: Full Artificial intelligence(AI) based chat bot feature. Type 'true' to enable and type 'false' to disable.

ANTIBAD.description: Bad word protection for groups. Type 'true' to enable and type 'false' to disable Anti-Bad.

ANTIBUG.description: Bug hole protection for groups. Type 'true' to enable and type 'false' to disable Anti-Bug.

ANTILINK.description: Remove members when share unwanted links for groups. Type 'true' to enable and type 'false' to disable Anti-Link.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: The remove message that appears when type the '.ban' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Type the JID address of the chat to disable the bot that works in chat.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: The message that appears when typing the '.block' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

BYE_LOGO.description: Picture with good bye message. Paste an image direct link or do '.setbye' command after deploying the bot.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: The message that appears when typing the '.demote' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

DM_BLOCK.description: Block everyone when send a message to inbox. Type 'true' to enable and type 'false' to disable inbox blocker.

HANDLERS.description: Enter bot prefix to use commands. (Don't delete ^[ ])

IMGBB.description: Paste your imgbb API to change ALIVE,Welcome,Bye pictures by a command. (Visit https://imgbb.com/ and signup there. And get an API key from https://api.imgbb.com/)

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: The message that appears when typing the '.kickme' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. Type EN for English and type SI for Sinhala.

MAX_SIZE.description: Set maximum media file sending size. Type size in MB. To best performance keep 90mb.

MENU.description: Set your command to get full command list.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: The message that appears when typing the '.mute' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

NAME.description: Your name. This will appear in your menu and many commands.

NO_ERROR_LOG.description: Stop all error messages in Log number. Type 'true' to enable and type 'false' to disable Error Log Blocker.

MENU_EMOJI.description: You can change panel emojis. (Make sure to split emojis with / )

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: The message that appears when typing the '.promote' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

SEND_READ.description: Need to show user whether bot message seen or not?

SUDO.description: If you do not know how to use it, leave it blank! SUDO mode; Your number must be an international number. So you have to have your number after the country code. Example: 947xxxxxxxx (Sri lanka No. 94)

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: The message that appears when typing the '.unmute' command. If you do not want to change it, keep 'default'.

WELCOME_LOGO.description: Picture with welcome message. Paste an image direct link or do '.setwelcome' command after deploying the bot.

WORK_TYPE.description: The way the bot works. If you use public, everyone can use the bot. If you use private, only you can use your bot.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: https://dashboard.heroku.com/account Click this link. Scroll down for the API key. Then click the Reveal button. Copy the API key and paste the API Key empty box below.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Use the same App name as first.

DEBUG.description: If you do not know this. Give it up.

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Here you, go to the website remove.bg and sign up and get an API key. Leave the API key in this space.

NO_ONLINE.description: This is not necessarily the case.

COFFEEHOUSE_API_KEY.description: Give it up. We give you this.

ALFI_PASSWORD.description: බොට්ව සෑදීම සදහා පාස්වර්ඩ් එකක් අවශ්‍ය අතර වීඩියෝව නරඹා එය ලබා ගන්න.password required.. watch the video ==>
